skills.name: Flay
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Generate Fury:</text> <text class='c_resource'>9</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>50%</text></br>Flay the enemy, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.05 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and inflicting <text class='c_number'>[[0.36 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]/5] * 5</text> Bleeding damage over <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds.

skills.name: Upheaval
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Fury Cost:</text> <text class='c_resource'>40</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>25%</text></br>Tear into the ground with your weapon and fling debris forward, dealing <text class='c_number'>[(0.7 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel)))]</text> damage.

skills.name: Wrath of the Berserker
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>60</text> seconds</br>Explode into rage, Knocking Back surrounding enemies and gaining <text class='c_important'><u>Berserking</u></text> and <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>603</text> seconds.  For the next <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds, dealing direct damage with <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grants <text class='c_important'><u>Berserking</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>602</text> seconds.

skills.name: Iron Skin
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>14</text> seconds</br>Steel yourself, gaining a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> that absorbs <text class='c_number'>[[(0.50 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel)))]*100]%</text> of your missing Life for <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds.

skills.name: Leap
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>[17 * ((cdr[sLevel])]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>66%</text></br>Leap forward and then slam down, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.33 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and Knocking Back surrounding enemies on impact.

skills.name: Steel Grasp
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Charges:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[2 + (1 * Mod.UpgradeB) + [AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_barb_004) ? 1 : 0]]</text></br><text class='c_label'>Charge Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[11 * ((cdr[sLevel])]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>25%</text></br>Throw out a trio of chains that deal <text class='c_number'>[0.23 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and Pull In enemies.

equipment.name: Archon Helm
affixes: <text class='c_gold'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a <text class='c_number'>35%</text> chance to gain <text class='c_random'>0.2</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Fortify</u></text> whenever you deal direct damage while <text class='c_important'><u>Berserking</u></text>.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Tunic
affixes: <text class='c_gold'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>42%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

equipment.name: Penitent Hammer
affixes: Each time a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next <text class='c_important'>Charge</text> or <text class='c_important'>Leap</text> deals <text class='c_random'>15%</text> increased damage, up to <text class='c_random'>225%</text>.

equipment.name: Lich Blade
affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +5.9% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

equipment.name: Doom Gauntlets
affixes: <text class='c_gold'>Lucky Hit:</text> Direct damage against Bleeding enemies has up to a <text class='c_random'>26%</text> chance to Stun them for <text class='c_number'>2</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
affixes: After swapping weapons <text class='c_number'>6</text> times, gain <text class='c_random'>0.2125</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Fortify</u></text>.
+0.026 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently

equipment.name: Warlord Boots
affixes:
Your <text class='c_important'>Weapon Mastery</text> Skills have an additional Charge.

<text class='c_gold'>Lucky Hit:</text> Damaging an enemy with a <text class='c_important'>Weapon Mastery</text> Skill has up to a <text class='c_random'>44%</text> chance to Stun them for <text class='c_number'>2</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Mother's Embrace
affixes: If a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill hits <text class='c_number'>5</text> or more enemies, <text class='c_random'>25%</text> of the Resource cost is refunded.

equipment.name: Circle
affixes: Whenever you deal direct damage while <text class='c_important'><u>Berserking</u></text>, inflict <text class='c_random'>26%</text> of the Base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Amulet
affixes: Attacking enemies with a <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skill increases the damage of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill cast by <text class='c_random'>5%</text>, up to <text class='c_number'>30%</text>.
